thread.title: Family's agony as British grandparents are slaughtered and dumped in a RIVER by armed robbers during terrifying raid at their South African farm

title: Family's agony as British grandparents are slaughtered and dumped in a RIVER by armed robbers during terrifying raid at their South African farm
text:
Opinion 'THEY WERE INSEPARABLE' Familyâ€™s agony as British grandparents are slaughtered and dumped in a RIVER by armed robbers during terrifying raid at their South African farm 
Christine and Roger Solik, from Wales, who moved to South Africa 40 years ago, were killed in an armed robbery on their farmland estate By MARYSE GODDEN
